Class CollectCookieFilter

java.lang.Object

Direct Known Subclasses:

public class CollectCookieFilter
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.servlet.Filter

General purpose Servlet Filter to collect and save an SSO TOken Cookie from an inbound HTTP request

Since:
6.0

The doFilter method of the servlet.
This method is called when the filter has been registered for a servlet or URI.

Specified by:
doFilter in interface javax.servlet.Filter
Parameters:
request - the current state of the request sent by the client to the server
response - the current state of the response sent by the server to the client
chain - the remaining chain of filters to be invoked
